contents:
So full of interesting mush of misinformation containing fake authentic lessons.

Yet most do not even bother to try anything in English that actually demands using of language itself.

Genuine grammar? Good.

Useless secondary level tricks? Better.

Linguistic stuff? Oh, you're my God.

Using the language itself? What kind of abomination are you? Get off my damn face!

So much interest in so much stubborn stupidity.

Pity, a dragonfly shall never know what it's like to have an eagle's view, for they never deserve it even in their grandest dream.

From now on, I shall only speak English and perhaps other languages when surfing outside the Wall.
